title: Trying to re-install League of legends but never works.
body:
I uninstalled every game i had for league and now when i try to reinstall league i get this shitty error.
https://i.imgur.com/L2zjjkG.jpg

Ive uninstalled and deleted every league file, yet whenever i download the launcher from the website it always says ''repairing'' as opposed to installing...

replies.body: I was able to see a bit of the error behind your client, and it looks like some file was either missing or heavily damaged so the client wasn't able to work properly. I would start up the repair through the client option and let that run without any firewalls or antivirus running. Sometimes those two can block certain game files it doesn't recognize as being safe, so it's good to give this a quick try before diving too much deeper.
